Key Match Events: Anthony Davis, Rui Hachimura, and Austin Reaves carried the hosts in the first half before LeBron James joined the party
LA's defense stepped up to slow down the Suns before the offense took over
Kevin Durant, Bradley Beal, and Devin Booker combined for 67 points, 19 assists and eight rebounds
LA rallied from a 22-point deficit to win 123-116
Austin Reaves had a key performance with seven points, three assists and several savvy plays
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Davis expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
LeBron James led the turnaround in the third quarter with 11 points and three assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: LA's defense limited Phoenix to 23 points in the second quarter after giving up 38 in the first
LA outscored Phoenix 35-24 in the third period to turn a nine-point halftime deficit into an 87-85 lead
Phoenix Suns hit eight 3-pointers and dished out 14 assists in the first quarter to take a 38-23 advantage
